title: Dungeon Brick Walls
info: Dungeon Brick Walls are the background Walls found naturally-placed in Dungeons. There are a total of 9 different variants, but each Dungeon can include only the three wall types matching that Dungeon's bricks. A single Dungeon will usually contain all three types in different areas; in each area, the Faction Flags found will correspond to the wall variant.
